summary.incident:
Goal! Rodrigo Zalazar Martinez (Braga) directs
his penalty into the top left corner and
past Anatoliy Trubin.

Orkun Kokcu (Benfica) is awarded a yellow
card for his tackle. He doesn't seem to
agree with the decision, but Miguel Nogueira
ignores the protests.

Nicolas Otamendi (Benfica) receives a yellow
card from the referee for dissent.

Chissumba (Braga) can't expect anything
else than a yellow card for his hard tackle.
And a yellow it is. Miguel Nogueira didn't
think twice about pulling it out of his
pocket.

A yellow card for a tackle by Joao Moutinho
(Braga). Miguel Nogueira doesn't hesitate
at all to make this decision.

Uros Racic (Braga) picks up a yellow card
for a foul.

It's time for a substitution. That's the
last involvement from Kerem Akturkoglu as
he is replaced by Bruma (Benfica).

Here comes a substitution. Andrea Belotti
(Benfica) is brought on as a substitute
for Florentino.

Here is a change. Andreas Schjelderup is
going off and Bruno Lage gives the last
tactical orders to Angel Di Maria (Benfica).

Angel Di Maria feeds the ball through to
Vangelis Pavlidis (Benfica), who picks up
the pass inside the box and quickly sends
it into the right side of the goal! The
goalkeeper was helpless. 1:1!

RED CARD! Joao Moutinho (Braga) makes a
bad challenge and receives a second yellow
card from Miguel Nogueira. He can have an
early bath.

Here's the change. Rodrigo Zalazar Martinez
leaves the pitch and Vitor Carvalho (Braga)
comes on as a substitute.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Gorby (Braga) replaces Uros
Racic.

Carlos Carvalhal decides to make a substitution.
Afonso Patrao will be replaced by Amine
El Ouazzani (Braga).

It will be a substitution. Tiago Gouveia
(Benfica) is ready to enter the pitch as
Tomas Araujo walks off.

We are about to witness a subsitution. Robson
Bambu (Braga) for Sikou Niakate.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Orkun Kokcu trots off the
pitch and is replaced by Arthur Cabral (Benfica).

Substitution. Joao Ferreira (Braga) replaces
Victor Gomez.

Francisco Moura (FC Porto) jumps for a cross
and plants a brilliant header into the roof
of the net.

Joel (Nacional) failed from the penalty
spot.

Matheus Dias (Nacional) picks up a yellow
card.

Ze Vitor (Nacional) is shown a yellow card
after a horrible tackle.

Fabio Vieira (FC Porto) has tested the patience
of referee Jose Bessa and goes into the
book for a previous late challenge.

Paulinho Boia (Nacional) goes into the book
for a horrible tackle. A yellow card is
necessary in this case.

We are about to witness a substitution.
Garcia (Nacional) is replacing Joao Aurelio.

Tiago Margarido prepares a substitution.
Andre Sousa is replaced by Luis Esteves
(Nacional).

Martin Anselmi has decided to substitute
Pepê and he is replaced by Tomas Perez (FC
Porto).

Ze Vitor (Nacional) must have known he would
be sent off for this foul, but he had to
stop the opponent at all costs. Jose Bessa
shows him a second yellow card and the game
has ended for him.

Goal! Samu (FC Porto) runs up to the ball,
stops and waits for Rui Encarnacao to commit
before slotting the penalty into the middle
of the goal.

Substitution. Chico Goncalves (Nacional)
on for Joel.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Ruben Macedo trots off the
pitch and is replaced by Dudu (Nacional).

Tiago Margarido decides to make a substitution.
Matheus Dias will be replaced by Jota Garces
(Nacional).

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Goncalo Borges (FC Porto)
comes onto the pitch for Joao Mario.

The game has come to an end for Fabio Vieira.
He has contributed as much as he could today.
He will be replaced by the fresh legs of
William Gomes (FC Porto).

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Leo Santos (Nacional) was quite harsh
and Jose Bessa didn't hesitate to show him
a yellow card.

An amazing individual effort from Rodrigo
Mora (FC Porto) ends with a strike from
inside the penalty area. He sends the ball
precisely into the bottom left corner and
makes it 3:0. Rui Encarnacao was helpless.

It will be a substitution. Andre Franco
(FC Porto) is ready to enter the pitch as
Alan Varela walks off.

Martin Anselmi has decided to make a change.
Danny Namaso (FC Porto) replaces Rodrigo
Mora.

Yellow card. Chico Goncalves (Nacional)
goes into the book for a bad tackle on his
opponent.

Garcia (Nacional) has to be very careful
for the rest of the match after receiving
a yellow card from the referee for a bad
tackle on an opponent.

The foul by Toni Borevkovic (Vitoria Guimaraes)
is worthy of a card and a yellow is duly
shown by Fabio Verissimo.

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Zeno Debast (Sporting Lisbon) was quite
harsh and Fabio Verissimo didn't hesitate
to show him a yellow card.

Fabio Verissimo shows the yellow card to
Joao Mendes (Vitoria Guimaraes) for a heavy
challenge.

Problems for Rui Borges as Ousmane Diomande
is not able to play anymore. His injury
is too serious and Jerry St. Juste (Sporting
Lisbon) replaces him.

Fabio Verissimo shows a yellow card to Nelson
Oliveira (Vitoria Guimaraes) for his blatant
foul.

There will be a change on the pitch for
the second half. Luis Freire probably wasn't
satisfied with the performance of Gustavo.
He is replaced by Nuno Santos (Vitoria Guimaraes).

Goal - 1:0! Maximiliano Araujo tees up Pedro
Goncalves (Sporting Lisbon) inside the box
and he curls the ball into the left side
of the net and past Bruno Varela.

Fabio Verissimo shows a yellow card to Geny
Catamo (Sporting Lisbon) for a tough tackle.

Substitution. Joao Mendes leaves the pitch
and is replaced by Vando Felix (Vitoria
Guimaraes).

Telmo Arcanjo (Vitoria Guimaraes) is booked
after bringing down an opponent. Fabio Verissimo
had an easy-decision to make.

It is time for a substitution. Jesus Andres
Ramirez Diaz (Vitoria Guimaraes) is on for
Nelson Oliveira.

Rui Borges has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Geovany Quenda (Sporting Lisbon)
replacing Hidemasa Morita.

Viktor Gyokeres (Sporting Lisbon) makes
a great solo run and pulls the trigger from
inside the box, beating Bruno Varela with
a strike into the bottom right corner. He
makes it 2:0.

Viktor Gyokeres (Sporting Lisbon) is awarded
a yellow card for his tackle. He doesn't
seem to agree with the decision, but Fabio
Verissimo ignores the protests.

Substitution. Miguel Maga will be replaced
by Bruno Gaspar (Vitoria Guimaraes).

Here is a change. Beni is going off and
Luis Freire gives the last tactical orders
to Marco Cruz (Vitoria Guimaraes).

The game has come to an end for Geny Catamo.
He has contributed as much as he could today.
He will be replaced by the fresh legs of
Matheus Reis (Sporting Lisbon).

That will be all from Pedro Goncalves who
is being replaced by the fresh legs of Conrad
Harder (Sporting Lisbon).

Rui Borges decides to make a substitution.
Trincao will be replaced by Ivan Fresneda
(Sporting Lisbon).

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Osman Kakay (Boavista) was quite harsh
and Claudio Pereira didn't hesitate to show
him a yellow card.

Claudio Pereira shows a yellow card to Nehuen
Perez (FC Porto) for his blatant foul.

Rodrigo Mora (FC Porto) makes himself some
space on the edge of the penalty area and
pulls the trigger. His accurate effort goes
off the post into the top right corner and
the score changes to 0:1.

Goal! Nehuen Perez unleashes a strike and
Ivan Marcano (FC Porto) deflects the shot
into the net with his body. 0:2.

GOAL! That’s a great strike from the spot
by Miguel Reisinho (Boavista) low into the
left of the net, giving goalkeeper Diogo
Costa no chance!

Martin Anselmi has decided to substitute
Rodrigo Mora and he is replaced by Pepê
(FC Porto).

A substitution has been made. Joao Mario
goes off and Martim Fernandes (FC Porto)
comes on.

Martin Anselmi prepares a substitution.
Stephen Eustaquio is replaced by Tomas Perez
(FC Porto).

Ricardo Paiva has decided to make a change.
Gregory Ariyibi (Boavista) replaces Salvador
Agra.

Claudio Pereira blows his whistle and Nehuen
Perez (FC Porto) is shown a second yellow
card for his foul. His manager will not
be pleased. He has lot of time to think
about it as he walks off.

Today's match ends for Samu who will be
replaced by Otavio (FC Porto).

Here is a change. Fabio Vieira is going
off and Martin Anselmi gives the last tactical
orders to Danny Namaso (FC Porto).

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Filipe Ferreira departs
the field of play to be replaced by Marco
van Ginkel (Boavista).

Miguel Reisinho (Boavista) is booked after
bringing down an opponent. Claudio Pereira
had an easy-decision to make.

Sidoine Fogning (Boavista) has tested the
patience of referee Claudio Pereira and
goes into the book for a previous late challenge.

Osman Kakay (Boavista) must have known he
would be sent off for this foul, but he
had to stop the opponent at all costs. Claudio
Pereira shows him a second yellow card and
the game has ended for him.

Goal! Ricardo Horta shows great vision to
find Rodrigo Zalazar Martinez (Braga) with
a cheeky pass inside the box, and his first-time
shot is precise and sails into the bottom
right corner. 0:1.

Goooooal! Jeremy Livolant beats his man
and slings in a cross towards Fahem Benaissa-Yahia
(Casa Pia), who evades his marker and plants
a fine header low into the middle of the
net from close in. 1:1.

It's time for a substitution. That's the
last involvement from Pablo Roberto as he
is replaced by Henrique Pereira (Casa Pia).

Carlos Carvalhal has decided to make a change.
Amine El Ouazzani (Braga) replaces Fran
Navarro.

Substitution. Ismael Gharbi (Braga) receives
a signal from the referee and is now allowed
to enter the pitch as Uros Racic walks off.

Goal! Cassiano displays great vision and
sends a pass to Jeremy Livolant (Casa Pia),
who shows brilliant composure inside the
box to bury the ball into the back of the
net. The score is 2:1.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Joao Ferreira (Braga) replaces
Victor Gomez.

It will be a substitution. Gabri Martinez
(Braga) is ready to enter the pitch as Chissumba
walks off.

Alexandre Santana has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Rafael Brito (Casa Pia)
replacing Renato Sam Na Nhaga.

Here's the change. Cassiano leaves the pitch
and Korede Osundina (Casa Pia) comes on
as a substitute.

Alexandre Santana has decided to substitute
Jeremy Livolant and he is replaced by Isaac
Monteiro (Casa Pia).

Here comes a substitution. Fahem Benaissa-Yahia
is given a rest as he is replaced by Tiago
Dias (Casa Pia).

Goal! Viktor Gyokeres slips it to Trincao
(Sporting Lisbon) on the edge of the box
and he finds the bottom right corner with
a great effort. The score is 0:1.

A yellow card for a tackle by Nicolas Otamendi
(Benfica). Joao Pinheiro doesn't hesitate
at all to make this decision.

Joao Pinheiro shows the yellow card to Morten
Hjulmand (Sporting Lisbon) for a heavy challenge.

There will be a change on the pitch for
the second half. Bruno Lage probably wasn't
satisfied with the performance of Angel
Di Maria. He is replaced by Andreas Schjelderup
(Benfica).

The foul by Rui Silva (Sporting Lisbon)
is worthy of a card and a yellow is duly
shown by Joao Pinheiro.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Hidemasa Morita (Sporting
Lisbon) replaces Zeno Debast.

Today's referee Joao Pinheiro rightly decides
to book Florentino (Benfica) for his harsh
tackle.

Goal! Vangelis Pavlidis shows great vision
to find Kerem Akturkoglu (Benfica) with
a cheeky pass inside the box, and his first-time
shot is precise and sails into the roof
of the net. 1:1.

Kerem Akturkoglu (Benfica) was probably
a bit loose with his words to Joao Pinheiro,
who decides to show him a yellow.

It's time for a substitution. Geovany Quenda
(Sporting Lisbon) comes on in place of Pedro
Goncalves.

Bruno Lage has decided to substitute Tomas
Araujo and he is replaced by Andrea Belotti
(Benfica).

The referee signals a substitution. Conrad
Harder (Sporting Lisbon) is brought on as
a substitute for Eduardo Quaresma.

Rui Borges decides to make a substitution.
Trincao will be replaced by Matheus Reis
(Sporting Lisbon).

Jerry St. Juste (Sporting Lisbon) joins
the action as a substitute, replacing Maximiliano
Araujo.

Here comes a substitution. Bruma (Benfica)
is brought on as a substitute for Alvaro
Carreras.

The game has come to an end for Kerem Akturkoglu.
He has contributed as much as he could today.
He will be replaced by the fresh legs of
Samuel Dahl (Benfica).

A substitution has been made. Vangelis Pavlidis
is replaced by Arthur Cabral (Benfica).

Joao Pinheiro shows a yellow card to Orkun
Kokcu (Benfica) for his blatant foul.
Jerry St. Juste (Sporting Lisbon) is yellow-carded.

Goal! Rui Silva gets a hand on the penalty
from Felix Correia (Gil Vicente), but can't
stop it from flying into the top left corner.

Maximiliano Araujo (Sporting Lisbon) receives
a yellow card.

The referee had an easy-decision to make.
A yellow card is given to Pablo (Gil Vicente)
for a foul that he committed a little earlier.

Marvin Gilbert Elimbi (Gil Vicente) goes
into the book for a horrible tackle. A yellow
card is necessary in this case.

The referee allows time for a substitution.
Jerry St. Juste will be replaced by Morten
Hjulmand (Sporting Lisbon).

Here is a change. Pedro Goncalves is going
off and Rui Borges gives the last tactical
orders to Conrad Harder (Sporting Lisbon).

Substitution. Geovany Quenda (Sporting Lisbon)
in, Hidemasa Morita out.

Santiago Gonzalez Garcia goes off the pitch
and Jordi Mboula (Gil Vicente) comes on.

That will be all from Pablo who is being
replaced by the fresh legs of Jorge Aguirre
(Gil Vicente).

Cesar Peixoto has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Joao Teixeira (Gil Vicente) replacing
Marvin Gilbert Elimbi.

Andrew da Silva Ventura (Gil Vicente) goes
into the referee's book. Yellow card.

Joao Marques comes off the pitch to be replaced
by Diogo Costa (Gil Vicente).

Goal! Maximiliano Araujo (Sporting Lisbon)
fires the rebound into the middle of the
goal after the ball breaks to him in the
box. The score is 1:1.

We are about to witness a subsitution. Biel
(Sporting Lisbon) for Geny Catamo.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Bermejo (Gil Vicente) replaces
Felix Correia.

The ball rebounds and arrives at the feet
of Eduardo Quaresma (Sporting Lisbon) just
outside the box. He doesn't think twice
and fires a magnificent shot into the top
left corner. His attempt was beyond the
reach of Andrew da Silva Ventura, so the
score changes to 2:1.

Eduardo Quaresma (Sporting Lisbon) receives
a yellow card.

Substitution. Matheus Reis (Sporting Lisbon)
has come on for Trincao.

Superb finishing from Fredrik Aursnes (Benfica).
Orkun Kokcu plays a fantastic through ball
and finds Fredrik Aursnes (Benfica), who
reacts quickly to get in front of the goal
and fire a low shot from close range past
the goalkeeper. It's 0:1.

That's a clear yellow card. Vangelis Pavlidis
(Benfica) goes into the book.

Nicolas Otamendi (Benfica) celebrates his
beautiful goal. He rises above the defence
inside the box and scores with a bullet
header from the free kick. The ball goes
into the middle of the goal and the goalkeeper
didn't have a chance to save that close-range
header.

Zeki Amdouni (Benfica) is substituted due
to injury. Bruno Lage gives a chance to
Andreas Schjelderup.

Jandro (Estoril) is cautioned by the referee
for a foul that he committed a little earlier.

It is time for a substitution. Tiago Brito
(Estoril) is on for Jandro.

Yanis Begraoui (Estoril) wastes a huge opportunity
to score from the penalty spot. He attempts
to slot into the bottom left corner, but
Anatoliy Trubin pulls off a superb save.

The referee signals that it is time for
a substitution and Alejandro Marques (Estoril)
is coming onto the pitch as Yanis Begraoui
cannot continue after picking up an injury.

Ian Cathro has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Rafik Guitane (Estoril) replacing
Andre Lacximicant.

Florentino (Benfica) takes his opponent
down and receives a yellow card from the
referee.

Vinicius Zanocelo (Estoril) scores a beautiful
goal. He climbs high to meet a cross and
finds the back of the net with a bullet
header that goes into the bottom left corner.

Substitution. Andrea Belotti (Benfica) has
come on for Vangelis Pavlidis.

Here is a change. Kerem Akturkoglu is going
off and Bruno Lage gives the last tactical
orders to Leandro Barreiro (Benfica).

Substitution. Goncalo Costa (Estoril) replaces
Pedro Alvaro.

Vinicius Zanocelo (Estoril) has tested the
patience of referee Joao Goncalves and goes
into the book for a previous late challenge.

Goal! A precise cut back on the goal line
from Diogo Calila finds Ricardinho (Santa
Clara) right in front of goal, and he easily
buries the ball into the bottom left corner.
0:1.

Ricardo Horta (Braga) scores! He latches
on to a pass and produces a perfect strike
from the edge of the box that goes into
the roof of the net and past the goalkeeper.

Leandro Pires is forced to make a change.
Matheus Araujo is not able to carry on due
to injury. He is replaced by Frederico Venancio
(Santa Clara).

Antonio Nobre has issued a yellow card to
Gabriel Batista (Santa Clara).

Gabriel Silva (Santa Clara) can't expect
anything else than a yellow card for his
hard tackle. And a yellow it is. Antonio
Nobre didn't think twice about pulling it
out of his pocket.

Serginho goes off the pitch and Pedro Ferreira
(Santa Clara) comes on.

Carlos Carvalhal has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Afonso Patrao (Braga) replacing
Fran Navarro.

Substitution. Vinicius Lopes (Santa Clara)
in, Joao Costa out.

Roger Fernandes (Braga) joins the action
as a substitute, replacing Ismael Gharbi.

Sidney Lima (Santa Clara) is awarded a yellow
card for his tackle. He doesn't seem to
agree with the decision, but Antonio Nobre
ignores the protests.

Leandro Pires decides to make a substitution.
Ricardinho will be replaced by Matheusinho
(Santa Clara).

Substitution. Gabriel Silva walks off the
pitch and Wendell (Santa Clara) comes on
as a substitute.

The substitution has been made. Gabri Martinez
(Braga) has replaced Rodrigo Zalazar Martinez.

A substitution has been made. Uros Racic
is replaced by Gorby (Braga).

Antonio Nobre shows a yellow card to Luis
Rocha (Santa Clara), who isn't surprised
as the tackle was really hard and late.

Matheus Pereira (Santa Clara) picks up a
yellow card for a foul.

The foul by Adriano Firmino (Santa Clara)
is worthy of a card and a yellow is duly
shown by Antonio Nobre.

Gustavo Correia shows a yellow card to Ivo
Rodrigues (Moreirense) for a tough tackle.

Goal! Yan Maranhao (Moreirense) with a wonderful
piece of finishing. He makes a yard for
himself after a well-taken pass inside the
box and strikes the ball into the bottom
left corner.

Pepê (FC Porto) is booked after bringing
down an opponent. Gustavo Correia had an
easy-decision to make.

Yellow card. Dinis Pinto (Moreirense) goes
into the referee's book after a bad challenge.

Goal! Fabio Vieira plays a neat lofted pass
into the box for Francisco Moura (FC Porto),
who beats the defender in the air and plants
a header into the left side of the goal
from close range. 1:1.

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Stephen Eustaquio (FC Porto) was quite
harsh and Gustavo Correia didn't hesitate
to show him a yellow card.

Substitution. Pepê will be replaced by Goncalo
Borges (FC Porto).

Martin Anselmi decides to make a substitution.
Nehuen Perez will be replaced by Tomas Perez
(FC Porto).

Cristiano Bacci has decided to make a change.
Pedro Santos (Moreirense) replaces Sidnei
Tavares.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Joel Jorquera Romero trots
off the pitch and is replaced by Jeremy
Antonisse (Moreirense).

Yan Maranhao goes off the pitch and Guilherme
Schettine (Moreirense) comes on.

Goal! Samu (FC Porto) wins the battle of
wills and sends an unstoppable penalty past
Caio into the bottom left corner.

Whoa! Such gestures are commonly penalised
and Maracas (Moreirense) duly receives a
yellow card.

The substitution is prepared. Martim Fernandes
(FC Porto) joins the action as a substitute,
replacing Stephen Eustaquio.

Cristiano Bacci has decided to substitute
Ivo Rodrigues and he is replaced by Afonso
Assis (Moreirense).

Samu (FC Porto) latches on to a precise
pass deep inside the box from Rodrigo Mora,
and he beats the goalkeeper with a low accurate
shot into the bottom left corner. He makes
it 3:1.

A substitution has been made. Alanzinho
is replaced by Luis Asue (Moreirense).

Martin Anselmi prepares a substitution.
Fabio Vieira is replaced by Andre Franco
(FC Porto).

The referee allows time for a substitution.
Samu will be replaced by Danny Namaso (FC
Porto).

Gustavo Correia shows a yellow card to Danny
Namaso (FC Porto) for his blatant foul.

Fantastic team goal! Viktor Gyokeres (Sporting
Lisbon) was set free in the area by Maximiliano
Araujo and made no mistake with a lovely
finish into the top left corner. 0:1.

Miguel Nogueira shows a yellow card to Marco
van Ginkel (Boavista) for a tough tackle.

Pedro Goncalves (Sporting Lisbon) has received
a yellow card for his foul.

Goal Viktor Gyokeres (Sporting Lisbon)!
Viktor Gyokeres (Sporting Lisbon) was put
through by Trincao and he showed brilliant
composure inside the box to fire into the
bottom right corner. 0:2.

A yellow card is awarded to Morten Hjulmand
(Sporting Lisbon).

Jorge Couto has decided to make a substitution
during the half-time break. Robert Bozenik
comes on the pitch for Moussa Kone (Boavista).

Jorge Couto has made a change at the break.
Gregory Ariyibi has come on in place of
Marco van Ginkel (Boavista).

Rui Borges makes a half-time substitution.
Geovany Quenda comes on in place of Pedro
Goncalves (Sporting Lisbon).

Miguel Reisinho (Boavista) sees a yellow
card from Miguel Nogueira after he sent
one of the opposing players to the ground.

Goal! Trincao produces a great pass that
finds Viktor Gyokeres (Sporting Lisbon)
inside the penalty area, who takes advantage
of the situation to rifle a low shot into
the back of the net. 0:3.

Maximiliano Araujo (Sporting Lisbon) gets
to a rebound inside the six-yard box and
produces a header. He manages to put the
ball into the middle of the goal, and thus
alter the score to 0:4.

A yellow card for a tackle by Maximiliano
Araujo (Sporting Lisbon). Miguel Nogueira
doesn't hesitate at all to make this decision.

That will be all from Morten Hjulmand who
is being replaced by the fresh legs of Hidemasa
Morita (Sporting Lisbon).

Here is a change. Maximiliano Araujo is
going off and Rui Borges gives the last
tactical orders to Matheus Reis (Sporting
Lisbon).

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Augusto Dabo (Boavista)
replaces Filipe Ferreira.

Jorge Couto has decided to substitute Salvador
Agra and he is replaced by Pedro Gomes (Boavista).

Geny Catamo (Sporting Lisbon) has picked
up an injury and is replaced by Conrad Harder.

Today's referee Miguel Nogueira rightly
decides to book Robert Bozenik (Boavista)
for his harsh tackle.

Miguel Nogueira shows a yellow card to Ousmane
Diomande (Sporting Lisbon), who isn't surprised
as the tackle was really hard and late.

Substitution. Ousmane Diomande will be replaced
by Jerry St. Juste (Sporting Lisbon).

Goal! Conrad Harder displays great vision
and sends a pass to Viktor Gyokeres (Sporting
Lisbon), who shows brilliant composure inside
the box to bury the ball into the back of
the net. The score is 0:5.

Goal! Tomas Araujo (Benfica) fires the rebound
into the middle of the goal after the ball
breaks to him in the box. The score is 1:0.

Vangelis Pavlidis (Benfica) receives the
ball inside the box, reacts quickly and
without any problems stabs the ball low
in the middle of the goal.

Amazing piece of skill! Zeki Amdouni (Benfica)
picks up a cross on the edge of the 18-yard
box and hammers the ball into the bottom
right corner. What a finish that is!

Fernando Fonseca (AFS) has tested the patience
of referee Carlos Macedo and goes into the
book for a previous late challenge.

Goal! Vangelis Pavlidis plays in Kerem Akturkoglu
(Benfica), who shows great determination
to get to the ball before a couple of defenders
and from inside the box he shoots into the
top of the net! Great finish - 4:0.

Gustavo Mendonca (AFS) sees a yellow card
from Carlos Macedo after he sent one of
the opposing players to the ground.

Rui Ferreira has made a change at the break.
Lucas Piazon has come on in place of Baptiste
Roux (AFS).

The teams are back out for the second half
and here is a change on the pitch. Rui Ferreira
gives a chance to Tomas Tavares and Fernando
Fonseca (AFS) is off.

The game is over for Kiki (AFS). Eric Veiga
comes on for the second half.

Alvaro Carreras (Benfica) receives a yellow
card for infringement.

Substitution. Andrea Belotti (Benfica) receives
a signal from the referee and is now allowed
to enter the pitch as Alvaro Carreras walks
off.

Bruno Lage has decided to substitute Zeki
Amdouni and he is replaced by Andreas Schjelderup
(Benfica).

Goal! Kerem Akturkoglu manages to prod the
ball to Andrea Belotti (Benfica) after a
melee inside the box, and he needs no second
invitation to slot the ball into the bottom
left corner. 5:0.

Substitution. Vasco Lopes (AFS) replaces
Tunde Akinsola.

Here is a change. Kerem Akturkoglu is going
off and Bruno Lage gives the last tactical
orders to Gianluca Prestianni (Benfica).

It's time for a substitution. Leandro Barreiro
(Benfica) comes on in place of Tomas Araujo.

That will be all from Vangelis Pavlidis

summary.incident:
What a wonderful finish! Vangelis Pavlidis
(Benfica) latches on to an inch-perfect
cross into the box and drills a low shot
into the bottom right corner. There are
not enough superlatives to describe that
goal.

Nehuen Perez (FC Porto) will miss the next
game.

Alvaro Carreras (Benfica) is booked after
bringing down an opponent. Joao Pinheiro
had an easy-decision to make.

pass, finds himself one-on-one with the
goalkeeper and sends a low drive past the
goalkeeper.

to injury. Bruno Lage gives a chance to
Samuel Dahl.

(FC Porto) is brought on as a substitute
for Stephen Eustaquio.

Borges (FC Porto) for Pepê.

to connect with a cross and powers his header
low inside the left post. Excellent finish.

Maria, who is replaced by Andreas Schjelderup
(Benfica).

off and Bruno Lage gives the last tactical
orders to Andrea Belotti (Benfica).

at the right time to get to the rebound
inside the box and gleefully rifles the
ball low into the middle of the net. It's
1:3.

Borges (FC Porto) receives a yellow card.

Nicolas Otamendi (Benfica) celebrates his

into the middle of the goal and the goalkeeper
didn't have a chance to save that close-range
header.

Goal! Fredrik Aursnes puts the ball on a
plate for Kerem Akturkoglu (Benfica), who

Ricardo Baixinho shows the yellow card to
Manuel Keliano (Estrela da Amadora) for
a heavy challenge.

Amani El Ouazzani (Braga) produces a beautiful
volley and the ball goes into the back of
the net!

The foul by Joao Moutinho (Braga) is worthy
of a card and a yellow is duly shown by
Ricardo Baixinho.

The manager makes a subsitution with Nani
(Estrela da Amadora) coming on for Gustavo
Henrique.

Substitution. Leo Cordeiro (Estrela da Amadora)
in, Manuel Keliano out.

The substitution has been made. Joao Marques
(Braga) has replaced Vitor Carvalho.

Daniel Sousa has decided to make a change.
Simon Banza (Braga) replaces Amani El Ouazzani.

Daniel Sousa prepares a substitution. Roger
Fernandes is replaced by Bruma (Braga).

Rodrigo Pinho will be replaced by Alan Ruiz
(Estrela da Amadora).

Goal! Nilton Varela hands Kikas (Estrela
da Amadora) the simplest of tasks from close
range after the cross evaded the keeper,
and he makes no mistake with his header
into the left side of the goal. 1:1.

It is time for a substitution. Caio Santana
(Estrela da Amadora) is on for Andre Luiz.

Filipe Martins has decided to introduce
fresh legs, with Ruben Lima (Estrela da
Amadora) replacing Nilton Varela.

Daniel Sousa decides to make a substitution.
Ricardo Horta will be replaced by Roberto
Fernandez Jaen (Braga).
Nani (Estrela da Amadora) picks up a caution.
Rodrigo Zalazar Martinez (Braga) is yellow-carded.

Ricardo Baixinho has issued a yellow card
to Joao Marques (Braga).

That will be a yellow card for one of the
players. The one who gets booked is Leonel
Bucca (Estrela da Amadora).

The referee Ricardo Baixinho awards Alan
Ruiz (Estrela da Amadora) a yellow card.

A yellow card for a tackle by Miguel Lopes
(Estrela da Amadora). Ricardo Baixinho doesn't
hesitate at all to make this decision.

Goal! Great play by Oscar Aranda releases
Sorriso (Famalicao) in space on the edge
of the box. He spots the keeper off his
line and coolly puts the ball into bottom
left corner. 1:0.

Joao Mario (Benfica) takes his opponent
down and receives a yellow card from the
referee.

This yellow card was deserved. The tackle
by Gianluca Prestianni (Benfica) was quite
harsh and Fabio Verissimo didn't hesitate
to show him a yellow card.

Fabio Verissimo shows a yellow card to Armando
Evangelista (Famalicao) for his unsportsmanlike
behavior after the match has ended.

Roger Schmidt makes a half-time substitution.
Orkun Kokcu (Benfica) comes on in place
of Gianluca Prestianni.

Orkun Kokcu (Benfica) is booked after bringing
down an opponent. Fabio Verissimo had an
easy-decision to make.

Substitution. Florentino walks off the pitch
and Alvaro Carreras (Benfica) comes on as
a substitute.

It is time for a substitution. Marcos Leonardo
(Benfica) is on for Jan-Niklas Beste.

Armando Evangelista is forced to make a
change. Sorriso is unable to continue due
to injury, Gil Dias (Famalicao) comes on.

Fabio Verissimo has issued a yellow card
to Junior Reis (Famalicao).

The substitution has been made. Rodrigo
Pinheiro (Famalicao) has replaced Calegari.

Armando Evangelista has decided to make
a change. Tommie Van de Looi (Famalicao)
replaces Gustavo Sa.

Leandro Barreiro will be replaced by Angel
Di Maria (Benfica).

Fabio Verissimo shows a yellow card to Zaydou
Youssouf (Famalicao) for his blatant foul.

What was Alvaro Carreras (Benfica) thinking?
He will not get away with that. The referee
shows him a yellow card.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Rochinha trots off the pitch
and is replaced by Mario Gonzalez (Famalicao).

Armando Evangelista decides to make a substitution.
Oscar Aranda will be replaced by Samuel
Lobato (Famalicao).

Alexander Bah comes off the pitch to be
replaced by Tiago Gouveia (Benfica).

Goal Zaydou Youssouf (Famalicao)! Zaydou
Youssouf (Famalicao) was put through by
Mario Gonzalez and he showed brilliant composure
inside the box to fire into the bottom left
corner. 2:0.

Samuel Lobato (Famalicao) receives a yellow
card from the referee for a foul that he
committed a little earlier.

summary.incident:
Goal! Andrew da Silva Ventura gets a hand
on the penalty from Galeno (FC Porto), but
can't stop it from flying into the bottom
left corner.

What was Sandro Cruz (Gil Vicente) thinking?
He will not get away with that. The referee
shows him a yellow card.

Ivan Jaime (FC Porto) collects a sweet pass
inside the penalty box and smashes the ball
inside the left post. What a clinical finish!

Here is a change. Kanya Fujimoto is going
off and Carlos Cunha gives the last tactical
orders to Sphephelo Sithole (Gil Vicente).

Here comes a substitution. Jorge Aguirre
is given a rest as he is replaced by Depu
(Gil Vicente).

Goal! Danny Namaso (FC Porto) wins the battle
of wills and sends an unstoppable penalty
past Andrew da Silva Ventura into the bottom
left corner.

Substitution. Fran Navarro (FC Porto) replaces
Danny Namaso.

Sandro Cruz (Gil Vicente) makes a bad challenge
and is given a second yellow card which
means he's off.

The referee demonstrates he won't tolerate
this behaviour. Josue Sa (Gil Vicente) is
given a yellow card.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Felix Correia trots off
the pitch and is replaced by Joao Pinto
(Gil Vicente).

Goal! Viktor Gyokeres puts the ball on a
plate for Pedro Goncalves (Sporting Lisbon),
who scores with a simple close-range finish.
It's 1:0.

GOAL! And it’s the keeper’s mistake after
his poor pass is easily intercepted by Pedro
Goncalves (Sporting Lisbon), who gleefully
finds the net from mid range with a first
time effort. That makes it 2:0.

A yellow card for a tackle by Aderllan Santos
(Rio Ave). Joao Goncalves doesn't hesitate
at all to make this decision.

Here is a change after the half-time break.
Tiago Morais (Rio Ave) is replaced by Joao
Tome.

Clayton (Rio Ave) is awarded a yellow card
for his tackle. He doesn't seem to agree
with the decision, but Joao Goncalves ignores
the protests.

Joao Goncalves shows a yellow card to Pedro
Goncalves (Sporting Lisbon), who isn't surprised
as the tackle was really hard and late.

Goal! Viktor Gyokeres (Sporting Lisbon)
pounced on a loose ball inside the box and
beats the goalkeeper with a shot inside
the right post. He makes it 3:0.

Luis Freire has decided to substitute Joao
Graca and he is replaced by Kiko Bondoso
(Rio Ave).

Luis Freire has decided to make a change.
Patrick William (Rio Ave) replaces Aderllan
Santos.

Substitution. Pedro Goncalves will be replaced
by Mateus Fernandes (Sporting Lisbon).

Joao Goncalves shows a yellow card to Geny
Catamo (Sporting Lisbon) for a tough tackle.

The referee stops play so that a substitution
can be made and Geny Catamo trots off the
pitch and is replaced by Matheus Reis (Sporting
Lisbon).

Ruben Amorim has decided to introduce fresh
legs, with Marcus Edwards (Sporting Lisbon)
replacing Trincao.

Substitution. Morten Hjulmand did his best
and is replaced by Daniel Braganca (Sporting
Lisbon).

It is time for a substitution. Brandon Aguilera
Zamora (Rio Ave) is on for Amine.

Here is a change. Ole Pohlmann is going
off and Luis Freire gives the last tactical
orders to Vitor Gomes (Rio Ave).

Here's the change. Hidemasa Morita leaves
the pitch and Rodrigo Ribeiro (Sporting
Lisbon) comes on as a substitute.

Clayton (Rio Ave) latched on to a sweet
pass and coolly slotted the ball inside
the right post.
